Key Match Events: Ángel Di María scored the only goal of the match in the 40th minute after a through ball from Cristian Romero.
Lionel Messi replaced Ángel Di María in the 56th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Ángel Di María stated, 'It was a deserved win. We have to keep working as we always do and stay as united.'
Di María also mentioned, 'Ecuador are an opponent we could meet in the Copa. We know it's going to be a very difficult tournament. Today was a good game to show what we can do.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a pre-Copa América friendly held in Chicago.
